quotes.quote: Silence is a text easy to misread.
quotes.author: A. A. Attanasio

quotes.quote: 'Tis better to be silent and be thought a fool, than to speak and remove all doubt.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to speak out and remove all doubt.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: He who does not know how to be silent will not know how to speak.
quotes.author: Ausonius

quotes.quote: The eternal silence of these infinite spaces fills me with dread.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Oppression can only survive through silence.
quotes.author: Carmen de Monteflores

quotes.quote: I think the first virtue is to restrain the tongue; he approaches nearest to gods who knows how to be silent, even though he is in the right.
quotes.author: Cato the Elder

quotes.quote: Silence is more musical than any song.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: A fair request should be followed by the deed in silence.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: My personal hobbies are reading, listening to music, and silence.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: Learn to get in touch with the silence within yourself and know that everything in this life has a purpose.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: There is no need to go to India or anywhere else to find peace. You will find that deep place of silence right in your room, your garden or even your bathtub.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Silence is the most perfect expression of scorn.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote:
With silence favor me.
(Favete Linguis)
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: A good word is an easy obligation; but not to speak ill, requires only our silence, which costs nothing.
quotes.author: John Tillotson

quotes.quote: Silence is one of the hardest arguments to refute.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: The most profound statements are often said in silence.
quotes.author: Lynn Johnston

quotes.quote: In the attitude of silence the soul finds the path in a clearer light, and what is elusive and deceptive resolves itself into crystal clearness. Our life is a long and arduous quest after Truth.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Well-timed silence hath more eloquence than speech.
quotes.author: Martin Fraquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: In silence man can most readily preserve his integrity.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Silence is golden when you can't think of a good answer.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Not merely an absence of noise, Real Silence begins when a reasonable being withdraws from the noise in order to find peace and order in his inner sanctuary.
quotes.author: Peter Minard

quotes.quote: I have often regretted my speech, never my silence.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: It is better wither to be silent, or to say things of more value than silence. Sooner throw a pearl at hazard than an idle or useless word; and do not say a little in many words, but a great deal in a few.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: The cruelest lies are often told in silence.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Nothing is so good for an ignorant man as silence; and if he was sensible of this he would not be ignorant.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.quote: Silence propagates itself, and the longer talk has been suspended, the more difficult it is to find anything to say.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It is a great thing to know the season for speech and the season for silence.
quotes.author: Seneca
